title: i updated my driver and now the game isnt working
body: i updated my dell driver to the newest version so it will be fun and ill have a better experience on my computer so i login into the client and think "hmm 1 more promo game to gold and then i can play ranked with my friend so it wont be cheesy" and right as the game loads the loading stops and says to check the driver is on the newest version and something about the video, i just updated it and its really making me sad and now i wont get a big mmr boost from not finishing promos with no losses

replies.body: I know you're in your promos, and it's really crappy for that to happen especially after going through routine updates.  I wanted to let you know, though, that you won't necessarily get a boost for not losing your promos unless you meant by playing with your friend.  You might need to rollback your driver or make sure that you've got the right one!  Go through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot, but make sure to test it in a custom game to prevent any losses or penalties.  I hope that helps!
i have updated my intel driver now so i could play the game like it said in the instructions but the game still doesnt work

Thanks for the follow up, though it sucks it's still happening.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can continue helping individually through there, and figure out what's going on.  We'll see you there!
